name: factual_accuracy
description: Stem and options contain no factual errors relative to the lecture materials.

interpretation.1: contains factual errors in both stem and options
interpretation.2: contains at least one factual error in stem or options
interpretation.3: mostly accurate with minor issues in stem
interpretation.4: mostly accurate with minor issues in options

name: no_hallucinations
description: Content is grounded in the lecture materials, not invented.

interpretation.1: mostly invented or irrelevant to lecture materials
interpretation.3: some content not grounded in lecture materials
interpretation.4: mostly grounded with only minor unsupported details
interpretation.5: fully grounded in the source material with no hallucination

name: correct_key_answer
description: The indicated answer is truly correct.

interpretation.2: key answer partially correct or contradicts lecture
interpretation.3: key answer mostly correct but debatable
interpretation.4: key answer correct with minor nuance issues
interpretation.5: key answer fully correct and precise

name: incorrect_assumption
description: The question and options do not contain false assumptions about the course material.

interpretation.1: question relies on a false or fabricated assumption
interpretation.2: some assumptions inconsistent with lecture content
interpretation.3: mostly consistent but minor assumption issue
interpretation.4: fully consistent except for minor nuance
interpretation.5: no false assumptions; fully aligned with course material

name: unambiguous_question
description: The question stem is clear and unambiguous.

interpretation.3: moderately clear but could be improved

name: unambiguous_options
description: The options are distinct, interpretable, and not confusing.

interpretation.1: options overlap or are confusingly similar
interpretation.3: options mostly clear but one or two overlap
interpretation.4: options distinct with only minor ambiguity
interpretation.5: all options fully distinct and interpretable

name: grammar_fluency
description: Stem and options are grammatically correct and fluent.

interpretation.4: all options unique except minor similarity
interpretation.5: all options clearly unique and non-overlapping

name: no_answer_hints
description: The stem or options do not give away the answer.

interpretation.1: obvious answer clue in wording or structure
interpretation.2: strong implicit hint toward correct answer
interpretation.3: minor clue or imbalance among options
interpretation.4: no meaningful hint but some subtle cues
interpretation.5: no answer hints or cues of any kind

name: plausible_distractors
description: Incorrect options are realistic and not trivially wrong.

interpretation.1: distractors are clearly wrong or irrelevant
interpretation.3: some distractors plausible, others too easy
interpretation.4: all distractors plausible except one minor issue

name: unambiguous_correctness
description: Only one option is clearly correct; distractors are clearly incorrect.

interpretation.3: some uncertainty but one mostly correct option
interpretation.4: only one correct answer with minor ambiguity

name: hard_to_guess
description: The question requires reasoning and understanding, hard for blind guessing.

interpretation.4: requires understanding and connection of ideas

name: option_balance
description: All options are similar in length, tone, and grammatical structure.

interpretation.1: options uneven in tone or length
interpretation.4: well balanced with slight stylistic differences
interpretation.5: fully balanced in length, tone, and structure

name: cognitive_engagement
description: Tests meaningful understanding, not trivial recall from rote memory.

interpretation.3: moderate engagement; some application or understanding
interpretation.5: elicits deep cognitive engagement and understanding

name: discrimination_ability
description: Effectively differentiates between students who understand the material and those who do not.

interpretation.1: fails to differentiate; all students likely score similarly
interpretation.2: weak differentiation; too easy or too hard
interpretation.4: good discrimination; performance aligns with mastery
